title: Ultimate Casual Kingdom World Sounds - Full Package
description: Over 50 unique soundtracks and sound effects for a casual kingdom game
longDescription:
“Did you know that having sharp sounds is equally important as having a sharp blade?"

Check Out the list of sounds

  • Buildings: 3 construction, 3 descontruction
  • Buttons: 3 back, 3 click, 3 next, 3 select
  • Heroes: 12 archer, 9 warrior, 9 wizard sounds
  • Monsters: 6 sounds of 5 types of monsters
  • Others: 7 miscellaneous sounds.
  • Shop Sounds:  1 acquired, 1 purchase, 1 sell
  • Soundtracks: 5 tracks - 2 with introduction and loop, 3 loop only
  • Stingers: 3 stars, 1 loop, 1 enemy coming, 1 warning, 1 location discovery, 1 lose, 1 win
